params.owner: The address that owns the tokens
params.spender: The address that is approved to spend the tokens

returns._0: The amount of tokens the spender is allowed to spend

params.amount: The amount of tokens the spender is approved to spend
params.spender: The address that is approved to spend the tokens

returns.success: True if the approval succeeded, false otherwise

params.account: The address to query the balance for

returns._0: The token balance of the specified account

burn(address,uint256).details: Only callable by addresses with MINTER_ROLE, emits Burned event

params.amount: The quantity of tokens to destroy
params.from: The address from which tokens will be destroyed

burnFrom(address,uint256).details: Reduces allowance and burns tokens, only callable by addresses with MINTER_ROLE

params.amount: The quantity of tokens to destroy
params.from: The address from which tokens will be destroyed

contractName().details: Used for contract identification and logging purposes. The name should be consistent across all versions of the same contract type. This enables external systems and other contracts to identify the contract's purpose and role within the protocol ecosystem.

returns._0: The contract name as a string (e.g., "kMinter", "kAssetRouter", "kRegistry")

contractVersion().details: Used for upgrade management and compatibility checking within the protocol. The version string should follow semantic versioning (e.g., "1.0.0") to clearly indicate major, minor, and patch updates. This enables the protocol governance and monitoring systems to track deployed versions and ensure compatibility between interacting components.

returns._0: The contract version as a string following semantic versioning (e.g., "1.0.0")
The number of decimal places as uint8

grantAdminRole(address).details: Only callable by the contract owner

params.admin: The address to grant admin role to

grantEmergencyRole(address).details: Only callable by addresses with ADMIN_ROLE

params.emergency: The address to grant emergency admin role to

grantMinterRole(address).details: Only callable by addresses with ADMIN_ROLE

params.minter: The address to grant minter role to

returns._0: True if the contract is paused, false otherwise

mint(address,uint256).details: Only callable by addresses with MINTER_ROLE, emits Minted event

params.amount: The quantity of tokens to create and assign
params.to: The address that will receive the newly minted tokens

returns._0: The name of the token as a string

revokeAdminRole(address).details: Only callable by the contract owner

params.admin: The address to revoke admin role from

revokeEmergencyRole(address).details: Only callable by addresses with ADMIN_ROLE

params.emergency: The address to revoke emergency admin role from

revokeMinterRole(address).details: Only callable by addresses with ADMIN_ROLE

params.minter: The address to revoke minter role from

setPaused(bool).details: Only callable by addresses with EMERGENCY_ADMIN_ROLE

params._isPaused: True to pause the contract, false to unpause

returns._0: The symbol of the token as a string

params.amount: The amount of tokens to transfer
params.to: The address to transfer tokens to

returns.success: True if the transfer succeeded, false otherwise

params.amount: The amount of tokens to transfer
params.from: The address to transfer tokens from
params.to: The address to transfer tokens to

returns.success: True if the transfer succeeded, false otherwise

allowance(address,address).notice: Returns the amount of tokens that spender is allowed to spend on behalf of owner

approve(address,uint256).notice: Sets approval for another address to spend tokens on behalf of the caller

balanceOf(address).notice: Returns the token balance of a specific account

burn(address,uint256).notice: Destroys tokens from the specified address

burnFrom(address,uint256).notice: Destroys tokens from an address using allowance mechanism

contractName().notice: Returns the human-readable name identifier for this contract type

contractVersion().notice: Returns the version identifier for this contract implementation

decimals().notice: Returns the number of decimal places for the token

grantAdminRole(address).notice: Grants administrative privileges to an address

grantEmergencyRole(address).notice: Grants emergency administrative privileges to an address

grantMinterRole(address).notice: Grants minting privileges to an address

isPaused().notice: Returns the current pause state of the contract

mint(address,uint256).notice: Creates new tokens and assigns them to the specified address

name().notice: Returns the name of the token

revokeAdminRole(address).notice: Revokes administrative privileges from an address

revokeEmergencyRole(address).notice: Revokes emergency administrative privileges from an address

revokeMinterRole(address).notice: Revokes minting privileges from an address

setPaused(bool).notice: Sets the pause state of the contract

symbol().notice: Returns the symbol of the token

totalSupply().notice: Returns the total amount of tokens in existence

transfer(address,uint256).notice: Transfers tokens from the caller to another address

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).notice: Transfers tokens from one address to another using allowance mechanism

 @return The symbol of the token as a string

 @return The number of decimal places as uint8

 @return The total supply of tokens

 @return True if the contract is paused, false otherwise
